item.description:
Come spend some of your St. Patty's Day festivities Saturday night as your incubator friends Jason, Giovanni and Jess perform as part of Rebels Without Applauze at Studio 40 at Improv Boston. We will perform along with troupes Fake Fake Monkey and Don't Tell Mimi. Shows start at 7 p.m. and tickets are $10 for adults and $8 for students. Saturday's tend to sell out so buy your tickets on line at: http://www.improvboston.com/shows/studio40

After the show, we will meet you in the lobby and we can all go out and continue the St. Patty Day festivities.
item.how_to_find_us: Go to show and meet in lobby after
item.name: Rebels Without Applauze performance
